properties.note: Right in front of the police substation
Unlike most surveillance cameras, this one points directly down Stanwix street. It might be more for traffic monitoring than surveillance.
Across from the Wood Street T stop

Attached to city property (traffic light arm), so I'm assuming it's a city-owned device. Unclear why it's at the same intersection as another city camera, or why it's on the traffic light arm instead of a lamp post.

properties.description: A small white camera unit with a black front face mounted on a vertical traffic signal support post facing the front of cars waiting at the traffic light.
